title: SC EP:289 Shooting at a Sasquatch
itunes:title: SC EP:289 Shooting at a Sasquatch
description: I will be speaking to the host of the Vault Of Nightmares tonight. He has some very interesting encounters to share while growing up on his grandfather's farm. His grandfather would warn him about these creatures and told him to stay away from certain areas on the farm. He made the mistake of hunting that area with his cousin and they shot at one of these creatures.
content:encoded: I will be speaking to the host of the Vault Of Nightmares tonight. He has some very interesting encounters to share while growing up on his grandfather's farm. He made the mistake of hunting that area with his cousin and they shot at one of these creatures.
